summary: Just a re-texture of the amazing armour made by Gatti.
descriptionHtml:
Something I threw together while watching a marathon of South Park, quite the combination, eh?

Anyways this is pretty much my style retexture of Gatti 04 Satsuki Armour, I decided to use a little more complex textures instead of simple re-colour. Hope ya guys like it and be sure to tell me your opinions even if you hate it~ I\'m always happy to hear your opinions. 

NOTE! As this is just a re-texture you WILL need to download the original one   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13633 from there.

Thank you for viewing and big thanks for Gatti for making this amazing armour and sharing it with us!

Thank you for the video MrKrossFaith!
author: Messias Mummo
